definition: Steep of Scorpions, a place in the Desert
kjvTranslation: Maaleh-accrabim, the ascent (going up) of Akrabbim.

translations.bg: Стръмнина от скорпиони, място в пустинята
translations.cs: Steep of Scorpions, místo v poušti
translations.da: Skorpionernes stejle, et sted i ørkenen
translations.de: Steppe der Skorpione, ein Ort in der Wüste
translations.el: Steep of Scorpions, ένα μέρος στην έρημο
translations.es: Empinada de Escorpiones, un lugar en el desierto
translations.fr: Steep of Scorpions, un lieu dans le désert
translations.hu: Steep of Scorpions, egy hely a sivatagban
translations.id: Curamnya Kalajengking, sebuah tempat di Gurun Pasir
translations.it: La steppa degli scorpioni, un luogo nel deserto
translations.ja: 砂漠の一角、スコーピオンの急斜面
translations.nb: Skorpionenes bratt, et sted i ørkenen
translations.nl: Steil van de schorpioenen, een plek in de woestijn
translations.pl: Steep of Scorpions, miejsce na pustyni
translations.pt: Pico dos Escorpiões, um lugar no Deserto
translations.ro: Steep of Scorpions, un loc în deșert
translations.sk: Strmý svah Škorpiónov, miesto v púšti
translations.sv: Steep of Scorpions, en plats i öknen
